Home Battery
Energy Storage

By incorporating battery backup into your home, you can notably slash your utility expenses while ensuring access to stored energy whenever it’s needed, including during power outages.

Get a Free Estimate

“Our electric bill reduction is even greater than we expected.”

We’re a licensed Solar & Battery Installer of

Realize Energy Freedom with Home Batteries

Incorporating a home battery enhances your energy management and contributes to lowering your energy expenses.

Why do you need a home battery?

Escape unfair time-of-use billing rates imposed by utility companies

Enhance the energy capacity of your solar panels by storing solar energy generated during the day, utilizing it during peak hours to sidestep high electricity rates

Secure backup power for critical appliances during blackouts

Diminish reliance on the grid and mitigate the impact of potential rate hikes

Save money on your electricity bills

Get a Free Estimate

Now Available

Power your life with the Tesla Powerwall 3

Introducing the Powerwall 3: redesigned for enhanced outage protection at a more budget-friendly rate. With just one unit, you can now safeguard your entire home during power interruptions while also maximizing energy storage for amplified savings on your bills.

Get a Free Estimate

Tesla Powerwall 3

Whole Home Backup Protection

The Powerwall, a sleek home battery, stores energy sourced from solar panels or the grid, enabling you to power your home appliances day and night, whether during outages or when opting for off-grid living. Tailor your energy usage with customizable power modes for enhanced outage protection, reduced electricity bills, and beyond.

Store Extra Energy

When your solar system generates more energy than you need, you can store the extra energy with Powerwall and save it for later. Powerwall can also recharge from the grid when utility prices are low.

Use Energy

Your stored power is available whenever you need it during the day, at night or when an outage occurs. A Powerwall system can power your entire home, including your heater and A/C, as well as other large appliances.

Save and Earn

Using your usage history, weather forecasts and utility price estimates, Powerwall optimizes your stored energy to power your home more efficiently, day and night. With some utilities, you can earn money by selling your energy to the grid.
